name: Crew Talent Advisory
address: 696 Bourke St, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
summary_description: We find talent with you, not just for you.At Crew, we work in-house as much as possible. That means we’ll iron an outfit, open up Google Maps and actually drive to your office for some proper strategising. Once we’re there, we’ll soak up your workplace energy and work towards a common understanding about who your perfect candidate will be. We do that by focusing on the specifics: are you looking for the wrong people? Are you looking in the wrong places? Will your applicants actually like their new job? Working with us ensures your hard-won reputation stays intact, because every applicant gets a proper response. And you can be confident the hopefuls on your shortlist will connect the with role, because we’ve taken the time to connect with you first.    We’re the only people people you’ll need.Great working relationships aren’t just about ticking boxes, they’re about finding the right chemistry. We’re here to create the winning formula for your business. And the first step is to ensure each member of our Crew is a people-based problem solver. The kind of person who’ll talk through the nitty gritty details of tech and marketing then stick around for a chat around the (metaphorical or actual) water cooler afterwards. Once we’ve come to a mutual understanding about who you are, what you do, how you do it and – most importantly – why, then we’ll be ready to help you attract the right candidates and watch the sparks fly.

name: Immersia
address: , Perth, , Australia
summary_description:
As one of world's leading immersive technology companies, focusing on the development of virtual reality (VR) and augmented products across several sectors, including resources, oil and gas, and construction.

We combine former IBM software engineering experience with top-tier consultants to ensure that our clients are delivered world-class solutions that  solve ‘real-world’ industry problems.

Immersia's current primary focus is the creation of a training platform that enables global mining companies to use hazard-based simulations to train staff in an interactive and immersive way. We also consult business across most major industries and have previously worked with organisations in marketing, architecture, government, healthcare and tertiary education.  

Our team has grown significantly since the company was founded in 2014 in Perth, Western Australia and now services clients in the Asia-Pacific, Europe and North America regions.

Immersia raised external capital for the first time in 2016, and has an Advisory Board that includes Hollywood film producer and VR pioneer Mr David C. Traub and Deloitte Data Analytics Founding Partner (WA) Mr Coert du Plessis.

Our purpose is to progress the game, so everyone can share in its heritage and possibilities.We have a strong workforce presence in most States and Territories of Australia including Northern Territory, QLD, NSW / ACT, Victoria and Tasmania.As the AFL industry continues to grow and evolve at both the elite and community levels, we are focused on ensuring we attract and retain great people in both permanent and casual roles at all levels and within all areas of our industry. Importantly, we aim to reflect the communities where our game is played by recruiting locally where possible to strengthen our connection to the ‘grassroots’ of our game. We are also fortunate to have hundreds of passionate volunteers within our industry, offering their time and expertise to help grow our game. The AFL's purchase of Marvel Stadium in Docklands, Melbourne, further diversifies our workforce with more than 1000 casuals employed to make every moment matter for our fans and customers.

name: The Travel Corporation
address: 35 Grafton Street, Sydney, , Australia
summary_description: Our philosophy is simple: to create enriching experiences for our travelers by combining an unbeatable mix of exceptional service and quality at great value.No matter their taste, whether they are a family or a couple, a group or travelling solo—The Travel Corporation (TTC) offers something for everyone. Our employees strive to create unforgettable memories and experiences for our clients. We push ourselves to consistently do better, to lead with all our brands. We are dedicated to the team, understanding that not one of us works best alone.As a worldwide travel expert, we currently operate in 60 countries, with over 35 offices and serving over 1.5 million customers annually. Core to our business is ensuring our impact is positive. The non-profit arm of TTC, our TreadRight Foundation, funds sustainable tourism projects worldwide, and our sustainability strategy, How We Tread Right, guides our offices, operations and experiences.Career opportunities at TTC are as diverse as the travel experiences we offer and our teams, our family, are absolutely our greatest asset. Working with a collaborative team spirit, we are dedicated to providing exceptional service to our customers.We are committed to cultivating diversity and inclusion within the business, and we provide training and support to foster career development and internal growth opportunities.We also encourage our staff to take advantage of our volunteer programme, which facilitates two workdays annually for each employee to give their time to a local charity of choice. That along with the excellent travel discounts offered to employees makes it an attractive value proposition in experiencing firsthand, the unforgettable travel experiences we offer our customers.If you are interested in getting involved with one of the world’s most exciting industries and joining a team that prioritizes sustainability, innovation, customer service and giving back, then we would like to hear from you.

name: Arc Infrastructure
address: Bravo Building - Level 3 1 George Wiencke Drive, Perth, WA, Australia
summary_description:
Previously called Brookfield Rail, Arc Infrastructure is a transport infrastructure manager.

The Arc Infrastructure team is made up of committed individuals who respect one another and the communities and environments in which we operate. 

We are connected through our desire to continually learn and improve and recognise that to achieve this, no one person or team can work without the other.

We say what we mean, and we do what we say. We work hard to ensure our people feel safe, valued and fulfilled in the work that they do. 

Safely connecting WA communities is what we do, and we’re in it for the long haul. Spread across regional WA, our team of 430 employees keeps the rail network operating 24/7. 

We live local, buy local and are committed to contributing to regional communities. We respect and appreciate the role we have in connecting our State to the rest of the country and beyond.

We’re committed finding new opportunities that will support and strengthen our rail network and the benefits it delivers to WA and beyond.

name: Gough Recruitment
address: Australia, Singapore & Hong Kong, Australia, Singapore & Hong Kong, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
GOUGH Recruitment – specialist recruiter in Real Estate, Property, Development & Construction.

GOUGH’s vision is to strive to be the leading and preferred industry specialist with a holistic approach to delivering quality talent in the Real Estate, Property, Development and Construction markets.

OUR SERVICE

Currently the leaders in Real Estate, Property, Development and Construction recruitment with fully integrated offices in Sydney, Melbourne, Perth, Brisbane, Singapore and Hong Kong, we are known for offering a localised service with international and national reach of quality candidates.


OUR NETWORK

Providing a range of recruitment and consulting services since 1989, GOUGH has developed strong relationships and built a quality network of candidates, with a high referral base for our clients. 


OUR TEAM

Our years of experience and passion for what we do, provides clients and candidates with top quality service that exceeds expectations. We conduct ourselves with integrity, passion, professionalism and a lot of energy!

name: Transport for NSW
address: Multiple locations , Multiple locations across the state, NSW, Australia
summary_description: We’re a New South Wales government organisation leading the group of transport agencies and divisions that keep NSW moving. With over 25,000 people working right across NSW, we drive the continual development of safe, integrated and efficient transport systems such as road, rail and maritime networks.  We’re committed to delivering better transport for the future of NSW, shaping our cities, centres and communities for generations to come. Right now, we’re delivering an ambitious and once-in-a-generation $72.2 billion program of public infrastructure works – the largest transport infrastructure program in Australia’s history. That means more job opportunities than ever before in metropolitan and regional areas right across the state – and your chance to make a lasting impact that will benefit generations to come.If you think Transport for NSW is home only to engineers, tradies and mechanics, think again. We've got roles you may not expect to see at Transport – from drone operators to graphic designers, Crash Lab technicians to boating safety officers, bridge engineers to demand planners, and all kinds of experts in between. In an organisation that’s as large, diverse and dynamic as Transport for NSW, there are thousands of opportunities. But it’s not just about what we do – it’s the way that we do it. We’re taking a new approach to the way we work. We’re embracing new technology and new ways of working. We’re building an open work culture where our people from a diverse range of backgrounds can thrive and continue to innovate. The road ahead is full of possibility and there’s plenty of work to do. We need great people to help us get it done.

name: Accenture Australia

summary_description:
Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialised skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services — all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. summary_description:
Located on Sydney's Northern Beaches, we provide tailored, cost effective and legislatively compliant HR solutions!

Allan Hall HR takes the complexity out of hiring, managing and exiting your employees by providing flexible, easy-to-use and cost effective solutions for all your human resource needs. We provide quality, value for money and responsive HR assistance, regardless of the size of your business.   

Our large team of HR specialists located on the Northern Beaches, have the experience and skills across a diverse range of HR areas and will provide your business with all the benefits of a dedicated internal HR professional, without the expense. Allan Hall HR is headed up by Gordon Parish who has over 30 years’ experience in HR, with outstanding expertise in workplace relations and management development. 

We can help you with all of your ‘people issues’ including recruitment, contracts of employment, policies and procedures, salary advice, working visas, training and development, managing performance, warnings and terminations. 

As a division of Allan Hall Business Advisors, Allan Hall HR provides you with the same respected level of professionalism, personalised service and integrity. 

Working as part of this cohesive firm of advisors, Allan Hall HR has built an excellent reputation for delivering quality, targeted and personalised people solutions to businesses ranging from SME’s to multinationals across a wide range of industries. 

We understand that no two businesses are the same, and all our services and packages can be tailored to the type of HR support you require and the size and scope of your business. We work collaboratively with you to  provide advice, documentation and support that is fully compliant with current workplace laws.

name: West HQ
address: 33 Railway St, Western Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
summary_description:
West HQ is Sydney’s leading landmark destination for Entertainment, Fitness, Lifestyle and Accommodation in the Western Sydney region. 

West HQ owns and manages the Sydney Coliseum Theatre – a 2,000 seat multi-modal theatre – which has seen West HQ secure the talents of Keith Urban, Tina Area, Amy Shark, John Butler, Missy Higgins, Anh Do, The Australian Ballet, Bangarra Dance Theatre, and the Sydney Symphony Orchestra. The construction of this world-class theatre led to West HQ partnering with Ticketek to create the West HQ Box Office enabling customers to purchase theatre and concert tickets directly onsite.

The Sydney Coliseum Theatre is West HQ’s second amenity of state significance. In 2013, the Olympic-standard Sydney Gymnastic and Aquatic Centre (SGAC) was built. Spanning 4,000m2, SGAC is the largest aquatic and fitness combination in the 12km radius. SGAC trains elite international athletes, has 6,600 Gymnastic participants per month, and its Aquatics program welcomes 140,000 swim visits per annum.

Some of Australia’s best chefs and restaurateurs also call West HQ home; the likes of the godfather of Italian pizza in Australia, Stefano Manfredi, PizzAperta Manfredi; Sean Connolly (The Morrison Bar & Oyster Room), Steak & Co. by Sean Connolly; and Steve Anastasiou (China Doll and China Lane), Chu Restaurant.

In 2019 West HQ announced its partnership with NEC to provide a ‘best in class’ customer experience for its patrons from menus, wayfinding, interactive customer promotions, and free Wi-Fi, through to a frictionless facial recognition access system and market-leading solutions for CCTV security. This partnership has positioned West HQ as a venue for technical innovation.

For more information, please visit: https://westhq.com.au/

name: DNEG
address: 55 Pyrmont Bridge Rd Level 2, Pyrmont, New South Wales, Australia
summary_description:
We are DNEG, one of the world's leading visual effects, animation and stereo conversion companies for feature film and television, with studios in London, Vancouver, Mumbai, Los Angeles, Chennai, Montréal, Chandigarh, Bangalore, Toronto and Sydney.

Since the opening of our first studio in London in 1998, we’ve always focused on building close working relationships with filmmakers. We thrive on collaboration and the creative energy this provides, and we are dedicated to delivering excellence on every project we are involved with.
 
We’ve brought home the Oscar for ‘Best VFX’ for six out of the last eight years. In total, we’ve been honoured with 7 Academy Award wins, 7 BAFTA Awards and 18 Visual Effects Society Awards for our visual effects work on shows like 'Dune', 'Foundation', 'Last Night in Soho', 'TENET', ‘First Man’, ‘Altered Carbon’, ‘Blade Runner 2049’, ‘Dunkirk’, ‘Ex Machina’, ‘Interstellar’, ‘Inception’ and ‘Harry Potter and The Deathly Hallows Part 2’.  
 
Recent movie projects include: 'Dune', 'The Matrix Resurrections', 'Venom: Let There Be Carnage', 'Ghostbusters: Afterlife', 'No Time To Die', 'Jungle Cruise', 'F9: The Fast Saga', 'Zack Snyder’s Justice League' and 'TENET'. 

DNEG Episodic recent projects include: 'Foundation', 'Doctor Who Season 13', 'The Wheel of Time', ‘Shadow and Bone, ‘The Irregulars’, and ‘Cursed’.

summary_description: Red Earth is an organisation that gives people the opportunity to make a meaningful connection to remote Indigenous Australia.  We do this by organising immersive programs to remote communities and homelands where traditional Aboriginal culture still lives strong. During these programs, people work on projects chosen by Traditional Owners and learn about the rich culture of the land directly from Elders of the local area. Small groups are welcomed by traditional clans and families on private lands that have been locked away for decades and that are not accessible outside of this setting.

name: Talent

summary_description:
Talent supplies thousands of tech and digital professionals annually to a diverse range of organisations through its offices across the UK, Germany, Australia, NZ and the US. From simple beginnings in 1995, Talent has always been on a journey to reinvent the world of recruitment through creating amazing customer and candidate experiences driven by a genuine desire to build long term relationships and outcomes. This motivation to break from the pack is stronger than ever as we roll out Talent Engage globally, an innovative life hub platform for freelancers based around rewarding loyalty and providing a range of professional and personal wellbeing programs.

At Talent we see community impact and legacy as vital to our business, which is why we tackle social bias and attitudes. We do this through our charity Talent RISE which provides employment opportunities for young people experiencing barriers to employment, and programs like 100% Human at Work promoting the importance of diversity, equality and respect in the workplace. Talent is also an active member of Virgin Unite’s B Team with a particular focus on the challenges and opportunities associated with the Future of Work.

We look to lead the way so we’re delighted to have our efforts acknowledged with 27 awards globally in the last few years from the likes of LinkedIn, EY, Deloitte, and Gallup who recognised Talent as one of the Top 40 companies in the world to work based on employee engagement.

name: Sharp & Carter

summary_description:
A CULTURE OF UNCOMMON CARE

We understand that looking for a job or looking for a new team member can be a stressful experience. We understand that sometimes recruiters make job seekers feel like commodities to be bought and sold. We understand that win-win outcomes are the ultimate measure of success and that our customers can become our greatest advocates. By understanding people, we aim to make the prospect of dealing with recruiters just a little bit more enjoyable.
 
Sharp & Carter finds and attracts the best talent in the market and delivers people-focused solutions for some of Australia’s leading companies. It is a team of individuals who aspire to change the way the recruitment industry is perceived and who believe that success can be achieved by putting people’s interests first. A partnership in structure and in values, Sharp & Carter is managed on the guiding principles of care, generosity and trust. Our belief is that when our team is empowered, we become better people for our customers to deal with and we genuinely believe that what we do and how we do it is important and can make a difference. We live our values of Partnership, Excellence, Integrity and Enjoyment.
 
 
Our team of experienced and industry specialised consultants recruit professionals across Victoria, New South Wales and Queensland in the following fields:
 
•         Finance & Accounting
•         Property & Construction
•         Legal & Compliance
•         Sales & Marketing
•         Business Support
•         Technology, Projects & Digital 
•         Executives

Sharp & Carter is more than just another recruitment agency.
 
If you’d like to know more visit www.sharpandcarter.com.au

Founded in Sydney in January 2010 with offices also in Brisbane and Melbourne, Perigon Group is a market leading specialised recruitment firm that is committed to providing the highest service levels and value creation to our candidates and clients.

Our Financial Institutions Group has the capability to recruit from back to front office and from entry-level roles through to Executive level positions. Examples of finance and banking positions we recruit include part and newly qualified Accountants, Operations Staff, Finance Managers, Financial Controllers, Chief Financial Officers, Strategy/Corporate Development roles, Investment Bankers (M&A, Structured/Project Finance, ECM), Funds Management roles and specialised Analytical positions at all levels. name: RECRUIT AUSTRALIA
address: 1 Queens Rd, Melbourne, , Australia
summary_description:
RECRUITAUSTRALIA.COM - SPECIALIST RECRUITERS - ESTABLISHED 2002
We fill the hard to fill positions. No fake adverts from us just real jobs.

Main areas within Recruit Australia:
1: Executive, Management & Engineering.
2: Technical Trades, and CNC
3: Office Administration.
4: Project Labour Hire.
5: IT & Technology 

From 2002 RecruitAustralia has been a specialist agency within the field of Manufacturing and Engineering. Since our conception, we have experienced yearly growth and have built long-term and stable relationships with many companies on a national basis. 

Due to this RecruitAustralia have further diversified and have now established a presence recruiting within IT, Office / Administration and Finance. We pride ourselves on knowing the industries that we recruit for, all of our team members have experience recruiting or working within their dedicated field. 

Engineering Division: 
Within Engineering RecruitAustralia we can provide your company with staff for a wide range of positions such a; CNC Machinist, CAD/CAM Programmers, Toolmakers, Sales Engineers, Service Technicians, Stores & Warehouse, Fitters, Welders, Fabricators amongst many others. 

IT Division: 
The IT positions that we deal with range from the following: Helpdesk/Support, Network Engineers, Developers, Programmers, Software Engineers, Project Managers, Business Analysts, Systems Administration, Trainer’s, Data Analysts, Testers, DBA’s and IT Managers/Directors. 

We pride ourselves on being able to fill the positions that you aren’t able to, so why not give us a call on 61 3 9696 6520 to see how we can help you out.

name: Minelab Metal Detectors
address: Technology Park, 2 Second Avenue,, Mawson Lakes, South Australia, Australia
summary_description: To the treasure hunter, the gold prospector, the protector: We know your quest. Minelab detectors are engineered for discovery. In fact, our R&D team is 50 engineers strong. That’s what makes our hand-held metal detection technology the best in the world. It has been for 35 years. We don’t plan to surrender that title anytime soon.We welcome the challenge of ‘difficult’ terrain. Magnetic minerals, iron-rich soil and deep water are no match for our innovation. You will see deeper with a Minelab detector than any other on the market. Minelab’s dealer network and operations span the globe: Australia, Europe, Middle East, Asia and the Americas. Our dealers are adventurers, hunters and prospectors just like you. No matter where you detect, they are ready to answer questions, suggest sites and celebrate your successes.  Every product that bears the Minelab badge is built rugged and precise. We’re ISO 9001 Certified and we manufacture to military-grade standards. It’s why military forces around the world trust our detectors to locate life-threatening landmines. Miners in Africa make life-changing gold discoveries with our detectors. And treasure hunters worldwide use our detectors to unearth history, from rare relics to ancient coin hoards. We know your quest and our detectors are precisely engineered to find the fortune you seek.  With Minelab, you’ll find performance is everything. Minelab is a division of Codan Limited, an international leader in innovative technology solutions with customers in over 150 countries.

summary_description:

EGS Australia provides specialist hydrographic and geophysical survey and positioning solutions to the Oil & Gas and Renewables, Telecommunications, Ports and Harbours and shipping market sectors with a workforce that includes Certified Professional in Hydrographic Surveying (CPHS) Level 1 surveyors which project manage and when required execute projects for our clients.

EGS Australia has gained a reputation for professional excellence in the hydrographic and geophysical survey sectors, being well known for our ability to find imaginative solutions to problems and making sure that the service we provide is always tailored to satisfying our client’s needs.

As part of the EGS Group, EGS Australia has access to active research and development facilities for developing unique survey systems and software, an invaluable resource that continually upgrades our capability and assures our future.

EGS Australia is an equal opportunity employment company employing people from various professions and different cultures. What really distinguishes EGS is the calibre of its people, which allows EGS to create an environment where innovation and professionalism flourish through teamwork.

name: Brownes Dairy
address: 22 Geddes St, Balcatta, Western Australia, Australia
summary_description:
Brownes Dairy is Western Australia’s oldest, and most iconic dairy company. Established in 1886, we are a family household name, and have been in operation for over 133 years. 

Brownes Dairy was started by Edward Browne as a small dairy farm in what is now Shenton Park.

Today Brownes Dairy operates from its main site in Balcatta and owns a second site in Brunswick, collecting over 150 million litres of milk each year from over 50 dairy farms in WA’s South West.

With a diverse portfolio of delicious dairy and other products including white milk, cream, yoghurt, flavoured milk, juice and desserts, our innovation kitchen bustles with activity, working on what we can do next!

name: Toyota Motor Corporation Australia
address: 155 Bertie Street, Port Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
summary_description:
Since its foundation in 1937, globally, Toyota has strived continuously to contribute to the sustainable development of society and the planet through its business operations.

It’s a principle that we have continued since Toyota Australia started in 1963 and has helped to cement our position as Australia’s leading automotive company.

Motor vehicles greatly expand the freedom of mobility, however, we recognise that they can also have an effect on our society and the environment. With this in mind, we listen carefully to our stakeholders as we pursue a business that works towards harmony with people, society, and the global environment.

We are continuously innovating to develop vehicles that meet the needs of the market both now and into the future.

Our research focuses on vehicles powered by a range of alternative fuels and vehicles with the potential for automated driving. 

Meanwhile we continue to work towards vehicles that are safe for everyone, and that maintain the standards of durability and reliability that people expect from the Toyota brand.

name: Melbourne Airport
address: Locked Bag 16, Tullamarine, VIC, Australia
summary_description: Melbourne Airport is Victoria’s gateway to the world, connecting the local economy to the global marketplace and enabling tourism, freight and trade. The value of this vitally important asset is underpinned by our history and legacy of long-term strategic planning and development. At Melbourne Airport, our vision is to be an airport Melbourne can be proud of.We welcomed more than 34 million passengers last year, and we’re expecting that number to reach more than 60 million passengers per year by 2033. Melbourne Airport is one of Australia’s premier transport hubs situated on an estate of 2,400 hectares. The greater Melbourne Airport precinct offers significant aeronautical infrastructure, a large business park and extensive road networks.More than 14,000 people currently work at the airport, in industries as diverse as aviation, hospitality, freight and logistics, transport and retail. Our curfew-free, 24/7 operation is vital to supporting our status as Australia’s premier air freight hub, and continuing the long-term growth in the number of international visitors to Victoria. Ownership StructureMelbourne Airport is owned and operated by Australia Pacific Airports Melbourne Pty Limited (APAM), a wholly owned subsidiary of  Australia Pacific Airports Corporation Limited (APAC).APAC acquired the lease for Melbourne Airport in July 1997. The airport is operated under a 50-year long-term lease from the Commonwealth Government, with an option for a further 49 years.

name: Murray River Trails
address: 1415 Murtho Road, Renmark, South Australia, Australia
summary_description:
Murray River Trails is a pioneering South Australian ecotourism company presenting a carefully crafted range of guided journeys that tell the story of a mighty river’s past, and project its bold innovative future. 

Proud Riverland locals and Murray River advocates, Tony and Susie Sharley founded the company in 2016, and it was originally known as ‘Murray River Walk’. A background in river management, wine tourism and eco-tourism created a determination to protect and sustain the area, and to diversify its regional economy following the ‘millennium drought’. This was matched by an unwavering passion to share the wildlife, landscapes, produce, history, culture, and stories of Australia’s greatest river.
Today, Managing Director, Tony, and Marketing Director, Susie, assume hands-on management and guiding duties, alongside full time Operations Manager, Lauren Ward. Lauren, who has grown with the business since inception when she started as a guide, now oversees a team of 8 guides and 5 boat drivers.
We are passionate about where we live, and our guides look forward to sharing our stories with you.
We offer three guided river experiences
- Murray River Walk, 3 night guided walk
- Murray River Safari, 2 night guided wildlife adventure

name: Launceston Airport
address: 201 Evandale Main Road, Western Junction, , Australia
summary_description: Australia Pacific Airports Corporation (APAC), in conjunction with the Launceston City Council, acquired the lease for Launceston Airport in May 1998. The Airport is majority Australian owned and is managed locally for the benefit of the region, echoing its logo tagline of "in the heart of Tasmania". APAC is a privately held corporation owned by institutional investors, predominantly superannuation/pension funds, managed or represented by the following 5 entities:- AMP; IFM Investors; Deutsche Australia Ltd.; Future Fund and  Hastings Funds Management. The airport is a "sister" airport to Melbourne Airport, which is also owned by APAC, with both airports being operated under a 50 year long-term lease from the Federal Government, with an option for a further 49 years. The management team are committed to the long-term safe and secure operation of the airport and to enhancing the airport's reputation with customers and stakeholders, ensuring long term growth and increased market share in Tasmania air services. The airport has been named Australian Major Airport of the Year for the past three consecutive years (2015; 2016; 2017)  by the Australian Airports Association (AAA) and currently handles more than 1.35 million passengers per annum.

name: Cleanaway Waste Management
address: Level 4, 441 St Kilda Road, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
summary_description:
Cleanaway Waste Management Limited is Australia’s largest, publicly listed waste management company.

With over 6,000 employees in more than 250 locations across Australia, we work with a diverse range of customers from small businesses through to government agencies and large multi-national clients.

We believe that all waste is a resource and aim to incorporate recovery, recycling and reuse throughout our operations and those of our clients. 

The Cleanaway difference is our dedicated team of highly trained in-house experts, who proudly deliver tailored solutions to our customers each and every day. 

Our areas of expertise include: 

General waste management and recycling services – including collections for homes and businesses; recycling and resource recovery; waste transportation, processing and disposal; and management of recycling facilities and landfills.

Industrial services – including management of liquid and hazardous waste; industrial cleaning, high pressure water blasting, vacuum loading, emergency spills response, hydro excavation and site remediation; collection, re-refining, recycling and sale of hydrocarbons and cooking oils; workshop waste solutions including parts washing; and plastic waste equipment manufacturing.

name: BlueScope
address: 120 Collins Street, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
summary_description: With 14,000 people across 18 countries, BlueScope is a leading international supplier of steel products and solutions for building and construction markets. Australia’s largest manufacturer, BlueScope’s portfolio of brands includes COLORBOND®, ZINCALUME® and TRUECORE® steels and the LYSAGHT® range of building products.  Steel plays a critical role in sustainable development. To BlueScope, sustainability means developing, manufacturing and selling steel products and solutions in a way that provides for a sustainable future, with a focus on continuous improvement, adopting new operating methods and anticipating new products for the future.BlueScope’s long-term growth is underscored by the sustainability of steel and the critical role it will play in supporting a sustainable society. We take a life-cycle approach, looking at the impact of a product over its entire life and focusing on the four principles of a circular economy: reduce, reuse, remanufacture and recycle.Our steel products and services ensure that we contribute to the opportunities and challenges of society’s move to a lower-carbon economy. To deliver long-lasting value and meet the expectations of all of our stakeholders, our business must transform on all fronts. Read BlueScope's latest Sustainability Report at bluescope.com/sustainable-steel.Interested in an exciting career at one of Australia’s most reputable companies with a track record of making things happen? Find out more at bluescope.comBlueScope has been named an Inclusive Employer for 2019–2020 by the Diversity Council of Australia.

name: Oracle
address: 417 St Kilda Rd, Melbourne, VIC, Australia
summary_description:
We’re a cloud technology company that provides organizations around the world with computing infrastructure and software to help them innovate, unlock efficiencies and become more effective. We also created the world’s first – and only – autonomous database to help organize and secure our customers’ data.
 
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure offers higher performance, security, and cost savings. It is designed so businesses can move workloads easily from on-premises systems to the cloud, and between cloud and on-premises and other clouds. Oracle Cloud applications provide business leaders with modern applications that help them innovate, attain sustainable growth, and become more resilient. 
 
The work we do is not only transforming the world of business--it's helping defend governments, and advance scientific and medical research. From nonprofits to companies of all sizes, millions of people use our tools to streamline supply chains, make HR more human, quickly pivot to a new financial plan, and connect data and people around the world.  

At work, we embrace diversity, encourage personal and professional growth, and celebrate a global team of passionate people developing innovative technologies that help people and companies tackle real-world problems head-on.

If you’d like to join us, please visit our Careers page: https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/

For investor news, SEC filings, and financial information about Oracle (NYSE:ORCL), please visit https://investor.oracle.com/home/.
 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/oracle 
Like our page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Oracle/ 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oracle/

summary_description: Ultradata is a leading supplier of financial technology solutions in the banking and financial services industry. Ultradata is end to end. We innovate, design and develop, install, and support all the components for every solution, and every effort in every project shares one common goal – long-term and sustainable growth for all our clients. name: Parallo
address: 277 William St Level 7, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
summary_description:
Parallo are cloud services specialists, laser-focused on helping SaaS companies accelerate growth. Faster growth means higher multiples, less dilution and larger exit values. We help increase GP, reduce churn, and grow ARPU and MRR.

Scaling is a race against cash burn. SaaS companies must ship new features fast and rapidly acquire new customers. Everything else is a distraction.

We remove that distraction by providing technical cloud services across Design, Build, Manage, DevOps, APM and more. We optimize for security, performance, availability and cost, and have been doing so since 2014.

We have offices across Australia, New Zealand and Singapore, and are part of the Crayon family of companies with 3,300+ employees globally.

We are a top 10 Global Microsoft Partner, an Azure Expert MSP, and an AWS Premier Tier Partner, working with 60+ SaaS companies and serving 250m+ end users.

We want to help you focus on your product and business growth, while we take care of your cloud platforms! 
Contact us to learn more.

name: Recruitment Sorted Pty Ltd
address: 1 Dickson Pl First Floor, Dickson , Australian Capital Territory, Australia
summary_description:
We are an IT recruitment company that puts people and trust at the forefront of what we do. We work to understand our clients and candidates, so we match the right person to the right role, to benefit everyone involved. 
 
In short, we consider the human and the skills.

At Recruitment Sorted our intention is to provide real, no BS recruitment that benefits both the client and the candidate. This includes through better rates (which support the client and candidate); and a recruitment process that centres around getting the right person for the job, leading to job satisfaction and program/organisation success!

Our fee structure and process is an open book. We pride ourselves on compliance and honesty and have a high care factor in everything we do. Through this, our community benefits from a seamless experience that is actually focussed on them. 

Chat with us today and see how we can work for and with you.


Our values:

We commit to transparency on all sides 
- For our contractors, we tell you what you’re going in at and we disclose all fees. 
- For our clients, there are no overinflated rates. We don’t have shareholders to please, so our focus is on giving you value for money with candidates who have been pre-qualified and are up to the task.  They will hit the ground running providing you value from day one! 

We uphold the highest levels of integrity 
- We don’t put up false jobs or create false candidates—we know we have the best candidates and we let their experience shine so we match the right people with the right jobs. 

We’re personal 
- We know that there are humans on all sides of this industry and we make it our responsibility to get to know you. 
- For contractors, this means no more calls offering you the jobs you’ve repetitively said you don’t want! 
- For clients, this means giving you applications from clients who have the skills you want and need.

name: OUI Recruitment

summary_description:
OUI Recruitment works with a personalised touch and our motivation is clear – we want to find you the right candidate for your business. We have the commitment and strategy to do this. We pledge to be transparent, honest, and upfront with all the candidates and clients we engage with.

We believe in a unique blend of the old and the new. AI, algorithms, and verbiage diagnostics can only do so much. We use this new technology coupled with an ‘old school’ meet and greet system - this ultimately allows us to get to know candidates better than any algorithm ever could, and in turn allows us to match you with the best individual for your team.

Scale & Swing is a recruitment firm purpose-built to serve the startup sector.

name: illion
address: 479 St Kilda Rd, Melbourne, VIC, Australia
summary_description:
Renowned for our expertise in credit risk management, illion prides itself in providing market leading products and services which securely store and analyse the unique data of millions of individuals and commercial entities.

While we specialise in credit risk assessment and decisioning software solutions, we also provide a full suite of products that span the entire credit lifecycle. This includes lead generation and sales prospecting tools and receivables optimisation solutions.

Our aim is to empower intelligent decision-making based on carefully analysed and derived data that has been meticulously examined and rigorously tested. We have developed close, long-standing relationships with many of our clients, who acknowledge the reliability and dependability of our products and services.

We employ over 560 people who strive to listen to our clients, understand their needs and provide them with exemplary products and services. We are driven by integrity and celebrate our achievements together.

Whatever your data and analytics needs may be, we can help you organise, design and develop a solution tailored to your business.

illion leverages its consumer and commercial credit registries, which comprise data on over 20 million individuals and over 2.5 million active companies, to provide end-to-end customer management solutions to clients in the financial services, telecommunications, utilities and government sectors.

illion's product and service offering spans the full customer lifecycle, from lead generation and sales prospecting, to credit risk assessment and decisioning (including associated SaaS products), and, ultimately, receivables management.

illion is headquartered in Melbourne with offices in all major metropolitan cities across Australia and New Zealand. Our team of around 700 work with the leading brands in our region to bring data & analytics to life.

name: face2face Recruitment
address: 3-5 Phipps Close Unit 10, Football House, Deakin, ACT, Australia
summary_description:
With more than 20 years’ experience in recruitment, award-winning face2face Recruitment specialises in matching positions to talent at all levels—CEO and CFO positions, senior and middle management positions and junior-level positions. We work across all industries and have recruitment teams dedicated to ICT and business support. 

Our professional recruitment services are used by public and private sectors and not-for-profit organisations.

face2face was founded in 2005 and is 100% Australian owned and operated. Managing Director, Kate Prior, spent more than 20 years as a recruitment consultant with large international firms before starting the business. face2face has worked on more than 9,000 positions since opening.

As a ‘big boutique agency, face2face provides highly personalised services that stretch well beyond traditional recruitment methods. Our service sets us apart from the rest.

Our database of pre-qualified candidates is extensive and our hit rate for successful placements high. We attract between 500 and 600 new job seekers a month. Although based in Canberra, we operate in capital cities, major regional cities and some remote parts of Australia.

face2face is a member of professional associations, fully licenced, registered and insured.

EMPLOYERS

We support employers by:

•	finding quality candidates with the right skills and cultural fit
•	conducting thorough background checks 
•	validating qualifications 
•	providing a guarantee should a placement not be 100% right.

CANDIDATES

We support candidates by: 

•	finding meaningful work
•	supporting with writing and editing resumes 
•	providing support for responding to selection criteria
•	providing interview coaching
•	staying in touch throughout a placement.

Our service is free to candidates looking for meaningful work.

name: Decipher Bureau
address: , Australia, Australia, Australia
summary_description:
Powered by Experience.

While the cyber security sector in Australia is most certainly still developing, AustCyber found Australia’s external spending on cyber security products and services grew by eight per cent to A$3.9 billion last year.

Over the coming years the industry will continue to develop and diversify as businesses continue to refine their product offerings to meet their customers’ varying cyber security needs.

As such human resource demands continue to grow with a significant shortfall across all areas of cyber security. One recent study found unfilled positions now stands at 4.07 million professionals globally. This includes a staggering 2.6 million shortfall in APAC.

That’s why the Decipher Bureau is here, to help harness the knowledge of some of the world's best Cyber Security and Risk professionals and channel this talent to our clients.

We offer recruitment and professional services which can be contingent or retained depending on the needs and requirements of our client’s business. Working collaboratively with some of the world’s leading cyber security teams we will decipher the noise and deliver to exacting standards.

Our experienced, agile team can deliver results across the region, with delivery capabilities across Australia and in Singapore, Hong Kong and the Middle East.

name: Australian Financial Complaints Authority
address: GPO Box 3, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
summary_description:
The Australian Financial Complaints Authority (AFCA) is the one-stop-shop for consumers and small businesses with a complaint about banking, credit, insurance, superannuation, investments and advice. We provide fair, independent and effective solutions for financial disputes. 

Established in 2018, AFCA is Australia’s only ombudsman service for the financial services sector. We work with consumers, small businesses, industry, regulators and Government, to raise standards and reduce financial disputes through innovative solutions, education and communication. We deliver to the Australian community services that are easy to use, free for complainants, efficient, timely and impartial. 

AFCA’s diverse workforce is made up of more than 800 team members from across Victoria and New South Wales, with expertise in dispute resolution, finance, insurance and superannuation. Our people are driven by our values to be fair and independent, transparent and accountable, honest and respectful and proactive and customer focused.  

We’re passionate about fairness and delivering a trusted and ethical service and excellent customer experience . Our culture and workplace reflects the diversity of those we serve. We share a vision to be a world class ombudsman service: raising standards and minimising disputes; meeting diverse community needs, and trusted by all.  

AFCA considers complaints that previously would have been handled by the Financial Ombudsman Service, the Credit Investments Ombudsman and the Superannuation Complaints Tribunal. 

Follow us for latest news, updates and to find out more about the work we do.

summary_description:
ABN AMRO Clearing is recognised as a global leading provider of integrated solutions in clearing, execution, custody, financing and risk management. With 10 offices globally, we are able to service clients on 160+ exchanges, MTFs and FX liquidity centres, processing over 20 million trades daily.

Our service is tailored to the needs of Principal Trading groups, Brokers, Financial Institutions, Corporates active in the physical commodity value chain and of Hedge Funds that apply strategies in multiple asset classes based on CTA/Managed Futures, Relative Value Volatility Arbitrage, and Long/Short positions including Synthetics. Our clients particularly value our sound balance sheet, the dynamic risk model with embedded leverage, a high level of asset protection and operational excellence.

By sensing the need in the market, we continue to re-invent the client experience with innovative solutions such as ‘Banking as a Service’ and ‘Retail One Stop Shop’, including fractions, effectively linking up market infrastructure with the Fintech world. 

ABN AMRO Clearing consistently ranks amongst the top 3 clearing firms on most relevant derivatives exchanges globally. With 800 colleagues, and together with our partners and our clients, it is our responsibility to encourage and support sensible and sustainable regulatory frameworks. We use our knowledge and expertise to lead the way to safe and transparent financial ecosystems.

name: City Beach Australia

summary_description: City Beach has established itself as one of the leading surf, skate, and street fashion retailers in Australia, with more than +60 stores across Australia, +300 brands, and thousands of employees. Working at City Beach is more than a job, you’ll be joining a family that’s been growing since 1985. From fun summer jobs right through to focused careers, the opportunities are endless. We are young at heart, we like to experiment, and we move at pace because we truly believe that anything is possible! Over the last few years, we’ve been transforming the way we work, introducing the latest in technology and innovation so that we can continue to offer our customers the best online and instore experience. But it doesn’t stop with our customers, our people are the ones who make it all happen! We welcome and encourage you to learn, grow, contribute, challenge and be challenged in a fast paced environment like no other. We value authenticity and we love tenacity, so if you see an opportunity let us know about it – you never know where it might take you and the business. name: Adairs Retail Group
address: 2 International Crt Caribbean Business Park, Scoresby, VIC, Australia
summary_description:
We’re the Adairs Retail Group (ARG) and we’re so proud to be recognised as Australia’s largest and most successful ASX-listed retailer of bed linen, furniture and homewares. 

Our vision is to be the leading destination for the home ─ and we're well on our way to realising this. We’ve experienced significant growth over recent years and are currently busier than ever, opening new stores, enhancing our extensive product offering and building our ideal team. This is all centred around our belief that home should be the happiest and most beautiful place in our universe ─ something we’re fearlessly focused on helping our customers achieve. 

Adairs began as a family-owned company back in 1918. Over 100 years later, we’re still a family at heart and our brand is stronger than ever. Today we have around 1,627 amazing team members across 169 retail stores in Australia and New Zealand, our Support Office and DCs, all working together to create WOW by delivering inspiration and expertise so that everyone can weave their own story of home. 

We do this by taking our love of design and style and channeling it into new-season trends and arrivals. We also collaborate with beloved Australian designers and artists to create unique and affordable new ranges. Above all, we always, always put our customers first.

We have a few transformational years ahead of us as we set out to change everyday living by enhancing our customer journey, moving towards a leading-edge e-commerce solution, and innovating our supply chain all while investing significantly in our team and technology. 

It’s certainly an exciting time to join our Adairs family. If you’re ready to take on an amazing opportunity with one of Australia’s fastest growing and most dynamic retailers then we’d love to hear from you. Check out our current vacancies via the ‘Jobs’ tab or visit http://careers.adairs.com.au/

name: Nimble Activewear
address: 135-153 New South Head Rd, Edgecliff, New South Wales, Australia
summary_description:
Know that buzz of finishing a great workout? Your body tingles, your mind’s rejuvenated and your heart is happy. At Nimble, we’ve taken that feeling and turned it into activewear that puts the planet first and makes you want to live your happiest, healthiest life. 
Like you, we know a thing or two about multitasking. That’s why we source the best fabrics and pride ourselves on clever innovative designs. Thanks to perfectly placed pockets for phones, and sneaky spots for keys and cash, you can hit the pavement - green smoothie in hand, dog leash in the other - and focus totally on you. Sit back, relax and let your activewear do it all… well kinda.
Just as we want our products to make you feel good, we want them to feel good for the planet too. Sustainable production, biodegradable packaging and recycling are all part of our MO. While you work hard on that treadmill, we’ll work hard at being as environmentally responsible as we can be. We’re pretty stoked to say we’ve now recycled over one million (and that number continues to tick up) used plastic bottles and turned them into our signature MOVELITE fabric. Yep, we turn waste into workouts ;) And those tights you just ordered? They’ll arrive at your door in a biodegradable corn starch bag. How’s that for corny?

name: Feathers Boutique
address: 562 Malvern Road, Prahran, Victoria, Australia
summary_description:
Founded by Margaret Porritt in 1972, FEATHERS has grown to become one of Melbourne's most iconic fashion brands. Comprised of 8 stores, a flourishing online offering and over 40 employees, FEATHERS is a renowned Australian business with over 50 years in the industry.

FEATHERS centers itself around offering generations of Australian women the opportunity to wear quality, on-trend designer styles at an affordable price. Porritt and her team are proud to offer women of all ages and silhouettes endless sophistication, practicality and style.

As a brand, FEATHERS aims to empower women and inspire personal confidence. Shopping at FEATHERS is all about the experience, whereby exceptional customer service and communication skills are at the crux of the brand’s objectives.

FEATHERS’ growth and determination in the industry is fuelled by new store openings, evolving concepts, and constant adaptability. Porritt’s passion for being ahead of the latest fashion trends, whilst retaining a range of classic and timeless pieces, brings FEATHERS to the forefront of the fashion industry.

Become a FEATHERS Insider to enjoy first access to new products, upcoming promotions, exclusive news and more.

name: TSHR
address: Level 6, 92 Pitt St, Sydney, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
ABOUT TSHR - Trak, Scarlett & HR 

TRAK RECRUITING is Australia’s most successful specialty retail recruiter and enjoys a relationship with 60 of Australia’s top 100 retailers. Covering all states of Australia, as well as international locations, roles range from $50k to “C” level. While the volume of these are store based or multi-site positions, we also recruit all head office positions such as Buying, Planning, Accounting, Property, Marketing, VM and eCommerce.

SCARLETT RECRUITMENT offers the same service specifically aimed at the fashion and textile industries with a manufacturing and wholesale focus looking at roles such as Design, QC, Production, Supply Chain, Product Development, Sales and Account Management.

TRAK HR Consulting recruits HR related roles at all levels but also provides outsourced HR support and strategy to retail clients on either a project or retainer basis and brings a focus on improved profitability through the power and performance of people.


Our aim at TSHR is to be recognised by both candidates and clients as the best at what we do – connecting the best people with the right companies and ensuring those companies gain maximum advantage by increasing the productivity and potential of their people.

𝗢𝘂𝗿 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘀𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀.

name: Randstad Sourceright
address: Level 23, 123 Pitt Street, Sydney NSW 2000, , Australia
summary_description:
As a global talent solutions leader, Randstad Sourceright drives the talent acquisition and human capital management strategies for the world’s most successful employers. We empower these companies by leveraging a Human Forward strategy that balances the use of innovative technologies with expert insights, supporting both organizations and people in realizing their true potential.

Business success today is entirely dependent on talent. Advancing artificial intelligence and automation tools can empower any employer to source and engage talent, but technology alone can’t create value. People can. That's why our subject matter experts and thought leaders around the world continuously build and evolve our solutions across recruitment process outsourcing (RPO), managed services programs (MSP) and integrated talent solutions: to deliver the competitive advantage and business impact you need to get ahead.

Our expert insights and industry-leading talent solutions result in recognizably higher quality talent, the people that are needed to realize your organization’s strategy. Our global Talent Innovation Center also offers specialized services in: recruiting strategies, employer branding, talent analytics and HR technology. 

We are consistently recognized for service excellence and innovation by industry organizations such as Everest Group, HRO Today Magazine, NelsonHall, and Staffing Industry Analysts. 

To learn more, visit www.randstadsourceright.com

To be part of a team that is changing the world of HR and to view/apply for current talent openings, visit www.randstadsourceright.com/careers

name: Lloyd Connect
address: 15 William St Level 19, Melbourne, , Australia
summary_description:
Lloyd Connect is a Recruitment Service Provider with a difference; we are committed to connecting employers of choice with high performing talent. You can rely on Lloyd Connect for end-to-end recruitment services and consulting capability, backed by over 30 years of experience in the industry.   

Lloyd Connect is bringing Recruitment as a Service (RaaS) to the marketplace.  If you’ve ever struggled to fit a recruitment fee into your monthly budget, we have a service offering that can help. We offer a subscription to our exceptional quality recruitment services. You pay a monthly fee & then call us in when you need us.  You know what to expect, with no huge fees throwing out your budget…how good does that sound?  

The RaaS package is tailored to suit you and your business’s specific recruitment needs with 4 levels of service on offer, enabling you to manage cash flow and grow your business.  In addition to the RaaS, as part of your subscription you’ll also have access to our highly desired consulting services. 

Not ready to try RaaS? Then we are happy to provide recruitment services the traditional way & charge you a once off fee for finding you a high performer for your team.

Jenny Lloyd is the Chief Connector at Lloyd Connect. Jenny brings you 20 years of recruitment experience across the Non-Profit, Aviation, Legal, IT, RTO, Utilities and Hospitality sectors, to name just a few.  She has made innumerable successful placements, varying from executive managers, sales executives, fundraising, accounts, customer service to reception & more! 

Jenny’s vision for Lloyd Connect is to bring RaaS to the market and work with a select range of clients, offering them the best possible service.

If you are looking for a different way to manage your recruitment budget - or are simply looking for a high quality recruiter with an extensive and diverse network and a reputation of successful delivery – Lloyd Connect is the right recruitment partner for your business.

name: Zimmermann
address: 120 Dunning Ave, Rosebery, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
This iconic Australian brand has stayed true to its original vision: sophisticated femininity, a passion for detail and a love of colour and print. Sisters Nicky and Simone ZIMMERMANN founded their namesake brand in Sydney in 1991.

Early in its evolution, ZIMMERMANN took the bold step of fusing fashion with swimwear and presented it to the world. It immediately found its following with the fashion elite, creating a new point of reference in flattering, feminine and stylish swimwear. While the swimsuit thrust ZIMMERMANN on to the international stage, it has been its optimistic, feminine and consistently desirable collections across its ready-to-wear and resort that have propelled it to greater global appeal.

While based at home in Sydney, ZIMMERMANN present their ready-to-wear collections each season at New York Fashion Week. They maintain showrooms in Sydney, London, Paris, New York and Los Angeles. Working with the highly acclaimed designer and long-time collaborator, Don McQualter, ZIMMERMANN maintains a number of stand-alone stores across Australia, Europe and the USA including flagship stores on Madison Ave in New York and Melrose Place in Los Angeles.

name: Every Bite Counts (Home of Little Bellies)
address: 59-75 Grafton St, Bondi Junction, New South Wales, Australia
summary_description: Based in Sydney, Australia, Every Bite Counts was founded by 2 brothers with 7 young children between them. They wanted to feed their families nothing but the best quality food, free from artificial additives, genetically modified ingredients, unnecessary salt and sugar and with minimal herbicides and pesticides, especially during the formative baby and toddler years.EBC was founded after one of their children was diagnosed with servere food sensitivities. The safe snack options at the time were significantly limited which drove their passion and awareness to develop foods with wholesome ingredients.Our portfolio of snacks and foods are designed to help support the natural development and progression of a child’s life-long food journey. Our research is dedicated to creating healthy, delicious foods for babies and kids that are nutritionally dense and offer new taste and texture experiences to encourage independent self-feeding. The Little Bellies brand philosophy is simple. WE DO WHAT'S NATURAL - We make wholesome age-appropriate baby, toddler and kids food. SO PARENTS CAN DO WHAT'S NATURAL - Focus on the simplicity of nurturing, supporting and raising independent little people from pram to playground, not the complexities of nutrition. SO KIDS CAN DO WHAT'S NATURAL! - Happily grow and develop, play, imagine, learn, laugh and love through every major milestone – from the earliest motor skills to ongoing positive nutrition.Little Bellies is Australia and New Zealand’s leading brand of baby & toddler snack foods and is sold in several international markets including USA, Canada, South East Asia, Middle East, Europe and South Africa.

name: Honey Birdette
address: Level 5 127 York Street, Sydney, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
Honey Birdette is a luxury lingerie and lifestyle brand led by Founder and Managing Director Eloise Monaghan. 

Bold, innovative and just a tad naughtier than you would expect, Honey Birdette has become the most talked about lingerie brand in Australia.  

Our first Boutique opened it's glossy doors in 2006 with a unique offering of high-end lingerie and premium bedroom accessories.  We are proud to now have 50 Australian Boutiques.

In September 2016 we opened our first International Boutique in Covent Garden, London.  We continued to grow and and now have four Boutiques in the United Kingdom.

In December 2018 we opened our first USA Boutique at Westfield Century City in Los Angeles.  We currently have four Boutiques in USA and continue our growth and success.

Honey Birdette has grown from one humble Boutique in Brisbane to 58 Boutiques globally.  We have over 300 amazing Team Members who we adore.   And a highly engaged and devoted Customer base who have supported our growth with great passion.

name: Modibodi
address: , , , Australia
summary_description: Modibodi® began in late 2013, but it took almost two years of picking, prodding, prototyping, washing, wearing, testing and fine-tuning to develop. We consulted with up to 100 textile engineers and fibre companies (both in the USA and Australia). We conducted close to 1,000 scientific tests. And we worked with leading Australian lingerie designers and manufacturers to create our patented finished product.Modibodi® uses high quality, tech savvy fabrics (like Bamboo, Merino Perform Wool and Microfibre) and the latest in breathable, antimicrobial fibres with our patented Modifier Technology – a super slim (only 3mm) stain resistant lining for modern periods and leaks, and Modifier Air Technology – a moisture-wicking, odour-fighting lining for getting sweaty.About Founder & CEO Kristy ChongKristy’s the CEO and creator of Modibodi™. She’s a mum on a mission, a fash-tech entrepreneur and a social advocate for women’s health issues and rights.With over 13 years in senior PR roles for organisations including McDonald’s Australia, sanofi-aventis and Edelman PR, Kristy’s worked with some of the biggest brands in the business.Fast forward to 2011, when the concept of launching her own business ignited. This ambition saw her design, develop and scientifically prove her patented Modifier Technology leak-proof undies and transform this into the Modibodi® collection: a reusable, sustainable range of singlets, sweat-proof undies and activewear created to liberate us.Kristy’s vision is to build a brand that makes the world better by empowering every bodi to make real, positive change. As part of this vision, Modibodi® actively supports causes and organisations close to our heart, such as Share the Dignity and Days for Girls.Modibodi® has also won (and been nominated for) numerous product and business awards including Telstra Business Women's Awards, Australian Womens Weekly Women in Business Awards, Ausmumpreneur, Aust Fin Review Aspire Awards.

name: Faithfull the Brand Pty Ltd
address: 265 Riley St, Surry Hills, New South Wales, Australia
summary_description: Faithfull is the creation of two globe-trotters with a love for travel and a vision to inspire women around the world to live well-travelled and inspiring lives.Growing up continents apart, travel brought Australian Sarah-Jane Abrahams and Norwegian Helle Them-Enger together. On the island of Bali, the two of them met and forged a friendship that would provide the opportunity to live the life of their dreams by taking the road less travelled. Together they bonded over their mutual love for fashion and style, but more importantly, the desire to see the world.They chose the name ‘Faithfull’ for its warm, feminine appeal. The essence of our label, apparent in each collection, is youthful and uncomplicated in design, with a nostalgic nod to vintage wardrobes of summers past. Faithfull fuses Scandinavian simplicity with Australian laid-back spirit, created within the island life ambience of Bali.Our pieces are designed with the modern traveller in mind. They are versatile and easy - allowing her to feel confident and stylish in the most effortless and attainable way possible.Faithfull is committed to creating thoughtfully produced, socially responsible garments that you can feel great about wearing on the inside, and out. Every decision we make aims to minimise our environmental footprint and maximise our positive social impact.Faithfull the Brand is extremely proud to be a certified B Corporation, based on our commitment to our community, our conscious business practices and our pledge to be a force for good

name: Signal Brands Australia
address: 29 William St, Alexandria , NSW, Australia
summary_description: SIGNAL BRANDSSignal Brands is a full service licensee that manages an exceptional portfolio of globally renowned brands. Founded over 25 years ago, we have a history of extremely successful licensing in the handbag, small leather goods, and luggage product categories. We develop long-term partnerships through a comprehensive licensing experience, from inspiration, concept, and design, to production, merchandising, sales, marketing, and global distribution. Signal Brands’ vertically integrated organization provides an incomparable capability to swiftly assess and adapt to market requirements. With a vast wholesale and retail distribution network, and tailored focus on customer satisfaction, we offer our partners long-term commitment and proven success.At Signal Brands, we love what we do! We are focussed on creating a portfolio of global brands that represent our customers, meeting their current and future needs. We believe the key to our success are the core values that guide us to work effectively with our customers, retail partners and brands to achieve mutually rewarding outcomes. SIGNAL BRANDS AUSTRALIAThe Signal Brands companies of Australia and New Zealand, established in 2017, are part of the Signal Brands Group. We manage a portfolio of globally renowned brands licensed for use within all categories clothing and accessories. For us, our people are important! We want to create a workplace to inspire our team members to work collaboratively and challenge themselves to deliver maximum customer value. We want to empower our team members to make a difference.We value and reward great results and like to have fun along the way.OUR BRANDSGUESSEstablished in 1981, GUESS began as a jeans company and has since successfully grown into a global lifestyle brand. Today GUESS designs, markets and distributes full collections of women’s, men’s and children’s apparel as well as accessories. Throughout the years, the GUESS image has been portrayed in unforgettable, innovative campaigns that have made the brand a household name. GUESS is distributed throughout the United States and Canada in fine department and specialty store, its retail and factor stores, and on its online store GUESS.com. GUESS has licensees and distributors in South America, Europe, Asia, Africa, Australia and the Middle East.STEVE MADDENWhat began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his deigns to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.

name: Nick Scali Limited
address: Triniti 2, Level 7 39 Delhi Rd, North Ryde, Sydney, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
Nick Scali Furniture was established over 50 years ago and is now one of Australia & New Zealand's largest importers of quality furniture. 

Nick Scali sources its products from around the world and imports directly from some of the largest and most respected manufacturers globally.

Quality is of paramount importance and we go to great lengths to ensure that all the lounges carrying the Nick Scali brand meet the most rigorous tests, so that they will stand the test of time.

Nick Scali Furniture imports over 5,000 containers of furniture per year. This large volume provides great buying power, ensuring quality and comfort at a price you can afford.


Working for Nick Scali

Working at a Nick Scali Furniture store provides an unparalleled opportunity for those who love selling to become the best you can be. 

In addition to our highly competitive salary packages, our Marketing & Advertising Strategies ensure the volume and opportunity to drive significant sales and commissions.
 
As a sales-driven organisation we welcome talented, high-energy, self-motivated salespeople who are driven to create superior incomes for themselves and their families. 

We are always looking for talented: 
•	Retail Sales Consultants 
•	Managers-In-Training 
•	Retail Store Managers 

While a retail sales background is preferred, we also employ sales professionals from many other industries and business backgrounds including high-ticket sales and luxury brands. 

Want to find out more or apply for a specific role in your area please click here: https://www.nickscali.com.au/careers

name: Four Fashion Australia
address: 43-51 Rupert Street, Collingwood, , Australia
summary_description:
A dynamic Australian and International Fashion business,  Battlefield Fashion House offers fast contemporary fashion across it's three in-house labels.

Founded in 2010 by sister duo Nellie and Denise, Battlefield Fashion House debuted Madison Square as the first label venture. Seven years later, the label stays true to its original vision of delivering chic and contemporary wardrobe essentials for trend savvy girl.

Since then, Battlefield Fashion House has welcomed two additional labels into it's brand portfolio, with the creation of Lost in Lunar in 2012 and SABAYA in 2015. 

Despite each brand boasting vastly different core aesthetics and values, each label has experienced great success in their own right. Operating on a weekly release strategy, both Madison Square and Lost in Lunar deliver weekly injections of fresh styles to both their eponymous online platforms and retail stockists Australia wide.

Sabaya debuted it's first indent collection for Spring Summer 16, with a focus on dramatic silhouettes, elevated fabrications and a strong seasonal colour palette.

The Battlefield Fashion House office has been head quartered in Melbourne, Victoria since its inception in 2010, and currently runs with a tight knit team of 8 employees.

name: 3P Learning
address: Level 5, 124 Walker Street, Sydney, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
At 3P Learning, our mission is to create a place where students, families and teachers can love learning. This passion translates to more engaged educators, motivated learners and an overall improvement in student knowledge and achievement.

3P Learning is the global leader in online learning for school-aged students, with our programs covering mathematics (Mathletics), spelling and literacy (Spellodrome), and reading skills (Reading Eggs).  All of our e-learning programs are designed by educators and educational technologists and are fully aligned with over a dozen international curricula – just one reason why they are trusted by over 5 million students and 20,000+ schools across the world.

In the spirit of “Love Learning”, 3P Learning hosts a variety of online educational events throughout the year, with the flagship event being the annual World Education Games.  This annual global celebration of learning covers 96hrs and encompasses World Literacy Day, World Maths Day and World Science Day. Over 5 million students have participated in the World Education Games to date, answering well in excess of 1.5bn questions. Our charity partner, UNICEF, allows us to engage students on a values education level too, for a holistic educational experience during the event.

name: Cluey Learning
address: , Sydney, , Australia
summary_description:
Cluey supports student learning growth. 

Student growth matters because it enables every student to progress regardless of starting point or capabilities.

We support student growth in subject learning and mastery; in confidence and commitment to learning; in engagement and enthusiasm for learning. We do this by working directly with students and their families to augment a student’s traditional, formal education – building on what they learn at school, supporting their academic development and performance in a way that meets their personal needs and circumstances.

Cluey is not a tutoring company or a marketplace. We don't just provide platforms, tools, content, or tutors. In order to improve student learning and growth we integrate and focus learning content, tools, support and feedback to target and adapt to student needs and performance over time. We don't think students might improve if they use Cluey, we know that they do.

Every hour of learning with Cluey generates ~100,000 data points that we map back to both what and how students are learning. No-one has been able to do this before. And this is just one of the things we do.

We're still in the early stages of this journey. We started Cluey in 2017 and launched the first version of our online tutorial model for individual students in 2018 (first for Mathematics, then for English and Chemistry). In 2019 we introduced small group learning for Mathematics and English and started running small pilot programs to support in-school learning. We listed on the Australian Stock Exchange (ASX: CLU) in December 2020 to accelerate our growth and expansion.

The work we do at Cluey is both interesting and rewarding. And a lot of our most interesting work is ahead of us.

name: Antler
address: 11 York St Level 8, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
summary_description:
Antler is the investor backing the world’s most driven founders, from day zero to greatness. Founded on the belief that people innovating is the key to building a better future, we partner with people across six continents to launch and scale high-potential startups that address meaningful opportunities and challenges. Knowing that exceptional founders can come from anywhere with any background, we have offices in 25 cities, including Austin, New York, London, Berlin, Stockholm, Bangalore, Jakarta, Singapore, Seoul, Tokyo, and Sydney. Our global community backs people from the beginning with co-founder matching, deep business model validation, initial capital, expansion support, and follow-on funding. Fueled by a personal passion that goes beyond traditional investing, we have helped create and invested in more than 600 startups across a wide range of industries and technologies, with the goal of backing more than 6,000 by 2030.

To find founders, get funding, and build a great company, get in touch here:  https://antler.co/apply

name: Recruitmore | Recruitment without the BS.
address: 1 Buckingham Street Level 3, Surry Hills, NSW, Australia
summary_description:
Recruitment without the BS. 

We opened our doors in March 2015. Since that time, we've been speaking to sales and client facing people all day, every day. 

What makes us different? We do recruitment without the BS.

You could be a sales person looking for work. We don't do fake ads. We don't BS about the salary. We give genuine feedback. We don't ghost you. 

You could be looking for staff! We don't overpromise. We don't have the perfect candidate for you! We don't drop our rates and provide average service. We only work with businesses who value our service- and for them we provide value in spades through time saving and the quality of the people we introduce. 

You could be a recruiter who is sick of BS. We pay north of fair- both on base and commissions. We don't lay people off at the first sign of a pandemic. We don't have starting and finishing times. We don't have arbitraty KPIs. We don't have BS in our office.

Recruitmore. Recruitment without the BS.
